actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to permit banks to deposit mailable matter in letter boxes.

summary.text: Permits banks to deposit mailable matter in letter-boxes without payment of postage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to permit banks to deposit mailable matter in letter boxes.
